properties.body:
CELTIC SEA.
IRELAND.
DNC 19.
ONE PERSON OVERBOARD FROM
VESSEL LODIGROUP INFORMATION NUMBER ONE,
CAPSIZED AND ADRIFT IN 50-20.30N 009-53.30W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 44 344 382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
EMAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
